import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowLeft, Home, FileText, Map } from 'lucide-react'; import './Sitemap.css'; const Sitemap = () => { return (
Back to Home

Site Map

Website Structure

This site map provides an overview of all pages and sections available on our website. Use this page to navigate to any section of our site.

Main Pages

Home Page

Main landing page with accessibility controls and demo content

Accessibility Declaration

Comprehensive accessibility statement and compliance information

Site Map

Complete overview of website structure and navigation (current page)

Accessibility Features

Text Size Controls

  • Normal text size
  • Text+ (25% larger)
  • Text++ (50% larger)

Contrast Options

  • Standard contrast
  • High contrast mode
  • Low contrast mode

Navigation

  • Keyboard navigation
  • Screen reader support
  • Focus indicators

Settings

  • Reset to defaults
  • Persistent preferences
  • Cookie-based storage

Quick Navigation

Go to Home Accessibility Info

Contact Information

For accessibility issues:

Email: accessibility@example.com

Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567

We welcome feedback to improve our accessibility features.

This site map is designed to help users navigate our website more easily. For the best experience, we recommend using the accessibility controls available on every page.

); }; export default Sitemap;
